name: ArtFight Elf Dress Up
description:
An "Attack Game" created for ArtFight

Game Jam: Super Casual Game Jam 2

Check out the oc creators here:

Snav | 3aeros |Kebby | rabbitlegs | Vanco | vividestined

  • You can play Fullscreen if you hit the 'Fullscreen' Button Twice
  • Consider checking out my other Dress Up Games
  • Unavailable on Mobile Devices
  • Feel free to share pictures of your characters in the comments!

(Mac) Hold: Shift >Command>3

(PC) Press the 'Windows' Key and search "Snipping Tool" + New Snip
